name: FCS
description: Import a Flow Cytometry Standard file (.fcs).

properties.name: use.descriptions
properties.description: Whether to use the description field to name variables.

properties.name: Separator
properties.description: Type of the separator between values (if custom compensation matrix is provided)

properties.name: which.lines
properties.description: Indicate the number of lines to be read. If -1, all rows are read, otherwise, a random sample of the size indicated by which.lines is read in
